name: Cryptid farm
description:
Watch out, it's a horror game!

arrow keys! F to plant carrots, Space to water, Shift to sprint. Enter activates the chat.
Brand new: Use G for the upgrade menu!
M to mute all sounds
Watch out for the snatcher spotted about your farm! They hunger for carrots and blood. 

It's multiplayer! (The game is currently designed to connect to the EU photon server so you may experience troubles if you're connecting from further away)

Hosting information: 
The first person to join the farm is the host. Right now there is no host migration, so if the host disconnects then crops will not grow properly and the snatcher will not function properly. If the host tabs out then the game will run very slowly. If you're the host, remember to keep the browser window in focus for everyone!

Credits:

  • FistFlame (me) for coding and art
  • tcarisland at https://opengameart.org/content/pocket-dimension for monster music
  • Cadere Sounds at https://opengameart.org/content/horror-cinema-7 for monster sound
  • kvgarlic at https://freesound.org/people/kvgarlic/ for bird song
  • Additional sound effects from freesound.org
